channel.title: News on PySAL
channel.description: Recent content in News on PySAL

item.title: New splot JOSS paper.
item.description: A new JOSS paper has been published that highlights splot.

item.title: spaghetti 1.4.2.post2
item.description: spaghetti 1.4.2.post2 released on PyPI and conda-forge. This release focuses on improved testing and functionality, specifically component and shortest path feature extraction. See the v1.4.2, v1.4.2.post1, and v1.4.2.post2 release notes for more details.

item.title: pysal 2.2.0
item.description: pysal 2.2.0 released on PyPI. Release Notes.

item.title: esda 2.2.1
item.description: esda 2.2.1 released on PyPI. This release includes bug fixes related to the Pandas 1.0 release. Release Notes are here.

item.title: libpysal 4.2.2
item.description: libpysal 4.2.2 released on PyPI. This release includes bug fixes related to the Pandas 1.0 release. Release Notes.

item.title: spaghetti 1.4.1
item.description: spaghetti 1.4.1 released on PyPI and conda-forge. This release includes new functionality with handling PySAL geometries and shortest path extraction, among other enhancements and bug fixes.

item.title: mapclassify 2.2.0
item.description: mapclassify 2.2.0 released on PyPI. This release includes new legend formatting functionality among other enhancements and bug fixes.

item.title: spaghetti 1.4.0
item.description: spaghetti 1.4.0 released on PyPI and conda-forge. This release includes major improvements to the API documentation and notebooks/tutorials.

item.title: libpysal 4.2.0
item.description: libpysal 4.2.0 released and available on PyPI and conda-forge.

item.title: Geocomputation 2019
item.description: Spatial Data Science with PySAL workshop at Gecomputation 2019.

item.title: gds-book
item.description: A new book is in the works! Geographic Data Science with PySAL and the PyData Stack.

item.title: pysal 2.1.0
item.description: PySAL 2.1.0 is released, representing 6 months of enhancements, bug-fixes, widening of test coverage, and improved documentation. All users are encouraged to upgrade to this version as there are numerous optimizations as well as new features that have been implemented. See the release notes for details.

item.title: spaghetti 1.3.1
item.description: spaghetti 1.3.1 released on PyPI and conda-forge.

item.title: giddy 2.2.1
item.description: giddy 2.2.1 released on PyPI and conda-forge. This release features an addition of several alignment-based sequence analysis methods. Refer to this example notebook to learn more.

item.title: SciPy 2019
item.description: A PySAL workshop will be held at SciPy 2019 in Austin, Texas, on July 8, 2019.

item.title: pointpats 2.1.0
item.description: pointpats 2.1.0 released on PyPI and conda-forge. This is the first version that officially supports Python 3.6 and 3.7 exclusively.

item.title: esda 2.1.0
item.description: esda 2.1.0 released. Changelog.

item.title: splot 1.1.0
item.description: splot 1.1.0 released with new splot documentation website!

item.title: mapclassify 2.1.0
item.description: Release of mapclassify 2.1.0 including new plot methods!

item.title: numfocus
item.description: PySAL is now a NumFOCUS affilated project.

item.title: giddy 2.2.0
item.description: giddy 2.2.0 released on PyPI and conda-forge. This is the first version that officially supports Python 3.6 and 3.7 exclusively.

item.title: spaghetti 1.3
item.description: spaghetti 1.3 released on PyPI and conda-forge. This is the first version that officially supports Python 3.6 and 3.7 exclusively.

item.title: giddy 2.1.0
item.description: Release of giddy 2.1.0 featuring the addition of two rank-based Markov classes for spatial distribution dynamics research.

item.title: gsoc19
item.description: PySAL is participating in Google Summer of Code under the Python Organization GSOC.

item.title: spaghetti 1.2
item.description: Third stable release of spaghetti (1.2).

item.title: foss4g
item.description: A PySAL workshop will be held at FOSS4G in San Diego, on April 19, 2019.

item.title: pysal 2.0.0
item.description: First stable release of PySAL 2.0 as a meta-package.

item.title: splot 1.0.0
item.description: First stable release of our new visualization package splot .

item.title: narsc18
item.description: A PySAL Workshop was be held at 65th Annual North American Meetings of the Regional Science Association International, San Antonio, Texas.

item.title: pointpats 2.0.0
item.description: First stable release of pointpats (2.0.0) since PySAL refactoring together with the launch of the pointpats documentation website!

item.title: spaghetti 1.1.1
item.description: Second stable release of spaghetti (1.1.1.post3) since PySAL refactoring together with new website.

item.title: mapclassify 2.0.1
item.description: mapclassify 2.0.1 released with new mapclassify documentation website!

item.title: libpysal 4.0.1
item.description: libpysal 4.0.1 released and we are also launching the libpysal documentation website.

item.description: mgwr 2.0.1 released and we are also launching the mgwr documentation website.

item.description: giddy 2.0.0 released.

item.description: esda 2.0.0 released.
